scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:root && npm run build:vault && npm run build:gallery && npm run build:comparison
scripts.build:vault: cd neurovault && npm ci --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build && cd .. && npx cpx "neurovault/dist/**/*" build/neurovault
scripts.build:gallery: cd neuropromptgallery && npm ci --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build && cd .. && npx cpx "neuropromptgallery/dist/**/*" build/neuropromptgallery
scripts.build:comparison: cd neuroaicomparison && npm ci --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build && cd .. && npx cpx "neuroaicomparison/out/**/*" build/neuroaicomparison
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm start" "npm run start --prefix ./neurovault" "npm run start --prefix ./neuropromptgallery" "npm run start --prefix ./neuroaicomparison"
